article: a select group of cricket heavyweights will meet in dubai on thursday to deliberate on zimbabwe 's future as a test team following the revolt and subsequent sacking of ## top players in the troubled african nation , sources said .
abstract: dubai to host cricket summit to debate zimbabwe 's future
